patthana17.27:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.27:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:4.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.27:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana17.27:5.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:5.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha
patthana17.27:6.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:6.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.27:6.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā ….
